name: Notion Fitness Planner
description: Get Fit and Stay on Track with Our Fitness Planner Template. Our template allows you to easily track your workouts and progress, all in one convenient place. With built-in features such as customizable workout plans, meal and nutrition planners, and progress visualizers, you'll always have a clear picture of your fitness journey. features: Quick Capture; Fitness Goal Tracker; Work Out Planner
